info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 10 at 11:42AM CDT until August 13 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin...
Cedar Creek At Cedarburg affecting Ozaukee County.
Milwaukee River Near Cedarburg affecting Ozaukee County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Cedar Creek at Cedarburg.
* WHEN...From this afternoon to early Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water is into Cedar Creek Park in Cedarburg.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 10.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.3 feet on 03/28/1962. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 1145 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING
